text: This is a list of Danish television related events from 1989. ==Events== *25 March - Birthe Kjær is selected to represent Denmark at the 1989 Eurovision Song Contest with her song "Vi maler byen rød". She is selected to be the twenty-second Danish Eurovision entry during Dansk Melodi Grand Prix held at the Bella Centre in Copenhagen. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Births== *15 September - Thomas Ernst, actor *22 September - Sofie Linde Lauridsen, actress & TV host ==Deaths== ==See also== *1989 in Denmark
title: 1989 in Danish television
